original_title: El crujido de un cuello de cisne al romperse
overview: Julian has moved with his father in a new building. One day, while he goes down in the elevator, he is “cocked” by an his neighbor, arousing something in him. As the days pass this event becomes a routine until the elevator stops working, making Julian to go outside looking for this “special touch”.
title: The Crack of a Swan's Neck When It Breaks
